actions.name: Thunderous Burst
actions.desc: The shrieker emits a concentrated burst of sound at one creature it can sense within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 10 DEX save, taking 2 (1d4) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

special_abilities.name: Plant Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The shrieker is resistant to exhaustion and to the paralyzed, petrified, and unconscious conditions.
